problem.markdown:
>>The dark blue line shows the trend over which months? (2 attempts) <<
( ) A. Values for February of last year to April of this year. ( ) B. Values for January of last year to January of this year. (x) C. Values for February of last year to January of this year. ( ) D. Values for December of last year to January of this year.
[explanation] The dark blue lines show values for February of last year to January of this year. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: The dark blue line shows the trend over which months? (2 attempts)

choicegroup.choice: A. Values for February of last year to April of this year.
B. Values for January of last year to January of this year.
C. Values for February of last year to January of this year.
D. Values for December of last year to January of this year.

div.p: The dark blue lines show values for February of last year to January of this year.
